name: Snake Eyes (LlamasEatingWaffles, FastJaz)
description:
Please Play in Fullscreen!

Snake Eyes is a small 2d Arena shooter in which you play as a dice. Each face on the dice gives you a special effect. Try and rack up as many points by shooting the cards! Hit the Slots machine at the top to temporarily stun it as well!

Different Power Ups:

1 : Slows you down, but getting snake eyes, two in a row, will clear the screen!

2 : A bouncy cannon, only 2 shots, hold to shorten the fuse!

3 : Spikes! They will block 3 hits from enemies and allow you to stick to walls!

4 : 4 shot Burst Rifle with 2 rounds.

5: 5 pellet Shotgun with 2 rounds.

6: 6 Shot Revolver. 

Controls :

Left Click : Shoot!

Right Click : Launch Yourself!
